statements: DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE software_version = 'v1.0' AND update_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM electric_vehicle_systems WHERE vehicle_model = 'Tesla Model S';
DELETE FROM monitoring_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT id FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla');
DELETE FROM software_errors WHERE error_type = 'Fatal Error';
